content: Non-Pure is an optional boss, but isn't too hard to miss due his location in the New Thunderclap Temple of The New West, the last big area of the region.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Pure.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Pure', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-Pure'.
The content is as follows:
Non-Pure is an optional boss, but isn't too hard to miss due his location in the New Thunderclap Temple of The New West, the last big area of the region.
